TextBody:
Hello Deepak,

I am sending the summary of the session.
As discussed, both of the servers are having a big database 150 and 166 GB - for which you will need to turn on Audit Log Backup with a smaller retention period.

Best regards,

Adrian Draghici |Technical Support Team Lead (EMEA/Asia/Aus)

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.
